recond.name: Than warren rabbit
recond.size: The standard weight is 8 to 12 pounds is one of the large rabbits

recond.name: Giant checkered rabbit
recond.size: A large rabbit larger than 5kg, similar in appearance to a Himalayan rabbit, but smaller in stature than a Himalayan rabbit.

recond.name: Cream of the rabbit
recond.size: The hair is quite thick at 3.8-5kg. The weight of the bogey rabbit is about 4-5kg. Compared with the Champagne rabbit, the bogey rabbit is relatively small in size.

recond.name: American Ginger rabbit
recond.size: The standard gingira rabbit has a short body, a flat head, upright ears and a length of no more than 12cm.

recond.name: Begonia dwarf rabbit
recond.size: The standard gingira rabbit has a short body, a flat head, upright ears and a length of no more than 12cm.

recond.name: The dodgers rabbit
recond.size: It is a petite breed of medium sized rabbit with a standard weight of 3.5 to 5.5 pounds.
